actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for the appointment of officers and employees of the Court of Claims, the Court of Customs and Patent Appeals, and the Customs Court, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes provisions for the appointment of officers and employees of the Court of Claims, the Court of Customs and Patent Appeals, and the Customs Court. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 791 (a),794, 831, 871, 872, 873)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for the appointment of officers and employees of the Court of Claims, the Court of Customs and Patent Appeals, and the Customs Court, and for other purposes.
